})]))
})
})

style.formula:
const isPressed = page.var.buttonPressed.get() === 'inpsection'
module.exports = {
    background : 'linear-gradient(0deg, #E39C17, #FAB93E)',
    borderRadius : 10,
    width : 100,
    height : 100,
    color : 'white',
    boxShadow : `0 5px 5px -3px rgba(0,0,0,0.3) ${isPressed?'inset':''}`
}

const isPressed = page.var.buttonPressed.get() === 'settings'
module.exports = {
    background : 'linear-gradient(0deg, #544B4B, #575757)',
    borderRadius : 10,
    width : 100,
    height : 100,
    color : 'white',
    boxShadow : `0 5px 5px -3px rgba(0,0,0,0.3) ${isPressed?'inset':''}`
}

queries.name: findFaults
queries.query:
select f.FAULT_NO_,
       f.FAULT_INFO_STS_ID,
       statusRef.CODE_ FAULT_INFO_STS_CODE_,
       f.ACC_STS_ID    ACC_STS,
       f.ACC_132_STS_ID,
       status132.CODE_ ACC_132_STS_CODE_,
       f.FAULT_INFO_REMARKS_,
       f.FAULT_INFO_DATE_,
       f.FAULT_INFO_AIRCRAFT_HR_,
       f.FAULT_INFO_SYS_ID,
       sysCode.CODE_   FAULT_INFO_SYS_CODE_,
       f.FAULT_INFO_HAS_CORROSION,
       f.FAULT_STS_,
       f.CLOSE_DATE_,
       f.FAULT_STATE_
from FAULT_UNITS f
         left join ADM_MST_SIMPLE_REF statusRef on statusRef.ID_ = f.FAULT_INFO_STS_ID
         left join ADM_MST_SIMPLE_REF status132 on status132.ID_ = f.ACC_132_STS_ID
         left join ADM_MST_SIMPLE_REF sysCode on sysCode.ID_ = f.FAULT_INFO_SYS_ID
where f.FAULT_STS_ = :faultStatus
order by f.FAULT_NO_ desc
queries.schemaCode:
z.object({
	FAULT_NO_:z.string().nullable().optional(),
	FAULT_INFO_STS_ID:z.number().nullable().optional(),
	FAULT_INFO_STS_CODE_:z.string().nullable().optional(),

	ACC_132_STS_ID:z.any(),

	FAULT_INFO_REMARKS_:z.string().nullable().optional(),
	FAULT_INFO_DATE_:z.string().nullable().optional(),
	FAULT_INFO_AIRCRAFT_HR_:z.number().nullable().optional(),
	FAULT_INFO_SYS_ID:z.number().nullable().optional(),
	FAULT_INFO_SYS_CODE_:z.string().nullable().optional(),
	FAULT_INFO_HAS_CORROSION:z.number().nullable().optional(),
	FAULT_STS_:z.string().nullable().optional(),

})

queries.name: findFaultHistory
queries.query:
SELECT DATE_                                                                                                 AS [DateTime]
     , USER_ID_                                                                                              AS Pid
     , CASE WHEN ACTION_ = 'Updated Fault Information' and FIELD_ like 'NLT%' THEN 'MODIFY' else ACTION_ END AS Action
     , CASE FIELD_
           WHEN 'NltDate' THEN 'NLT DATE'
           WHEN 'NltAircraftHours' THEN 'NLT AIRCRAFT HOURS'
           WHEN 'NltCycles' THEN 'NLT CYCLES'
           WHEN 'NltLandings' THEN 'NLT LANDINGS'
           WHEN 'NltStatusUpgrade' THEN 'NLT STATUS UPGRADE'
           WHEN 'PartNo' THEN 'PART NO.'
           WHEN 'SerialNo' THEN 'SERIAL NO.'
           WHEN 'AffectedArea' THEN 'AFFECTED AREA'
           WHEN 'WorkArea' THEN 'WORK AREA'
           WHEN 'CorrosionLevel' THEN 'CORROSION LEVEL'
           WHEN 'RepeatFault' THEN 'REPEAT FAULT'
           WHEN 'MecIssued' THEN 'MEC ISSUED'
           WHEN 'Action' THEN 'ACTION'
           WHEN 'EstimatedCost' THEN 'ESTIMATED COST'
           WHEN 'Aog' THEN 'AOG'
           WHEN 'MaintenanceHours' THEN 'MAINT. HOURS'
           WHEN 'IdentifiedCorrosionFault' THEN 'IDENTIFIED CORROSION FAULT'
           WHEN 'SuggestedPreventionAction' THEN 'SUGGESTED PREVENTION ACTIONS'
           WHEN 'FaultCorrectiveAction' THEN 'FAULT''S CORRECTIVE ACTION'
           WHEN 'Location' THEN 'LOCATION'
           WHEN 'Dimension' THEN 'DIMENSION'
           WHEN 'Type' THEN 'TYPE'
           ELSE FIELD_ END                                                                                   AS ModifiedField
     , CASE WHEN FIELD_ = 'NltDate' and OLD_ != '' THEN SUBSTR(OLD_, 0, LENGTH(OLD_) - 10) ELSE OLD_ END     AS OldValue
     , CASE WHEN FIELD_ = 'NltDate' and NEW_ != '' THEN SUBSTR(NEW_, 0, LENGTH(NEW_) - 10) ELSE NEW_ END     AS NewValue
     , CASE WHEN RECORD_ IS NULL THEN 'N/A' ELSE RECORD_ END                                                 AS Record
     , REMARKS_                                                                                              AS Remarks
       ,FAULT_UNIT.FAULT_NO_ AS FaultNo
FROM MNT_TRN_FAULT_ACTIVITIES JOIN MNT_TRN_FAULT_UNITS AS FAULT_UNIT ON FAULT_UNIT.ID_ = FAULT_UNIT_ID
WHERE FAULT_UNIT.FAULT_NO_ = :faultNo
ORDER BY DATE_ DESC

	Record:z.string().nullable().optional(),

select fu.FAULT_NO_,
       fu.CREATED_BY_,
       fh.OPEN_DATE_,
       fh.OPEN_TOT_MINUTES_,

       fh.OPEN_CYCLES_,
       fh.OPEN_ROUNDS_,

       fh.OPEN_DUE_HOURS_,
       fh.OPEN_DUE_CYCLES_,
       fh.OPEN_DUE_LANDINGS_,
       fh.OPEN_DUE_DATE_,

from INSPECTION_FAULT_HISTORY fh
         join FAULT_UNITS fu on fh.FAULT_UNIT_ID_ = fu.FAULT_UNIT_ID_
where fu.INSP_ID = :inspId

queries.name: findInspectionList
queries.query:
SELECT ASSIGNMENT.ASSIGNMENT_ID_              InspId,
       MASTER.ORDER_                          Orders,
       MASTER.INSP_NUMBER_                    InspNo,
       (SELECT STATUS.ID_
        FROM MNT_TRN_FAULT_UNITS FAULT
                 JOIN MNT_TRN_INSPECTION_ASSIGNMENTS ASSIGNMENTS ON FAULT.INSP_ID = ASSIGNMENTS.ID_
                 JOIN ADM_MST_SIMPLE_REF STATUS ON STATUS.ID_ = FAULT.FAULT_INFO_STS_ID
        WHERE ASSIGNMENTS.ID_ = ASSIGNMENT.ASSIGNMENT_ID_
        LIMIT 1) AS                           Status,
       MASTER.INSP_NAME_                      InspectionName,
       MASTER.INT_DUR_HOURS_                  DurHours,
       MASTER.INT_DUR_VALUE_                  DurCalendar,
       MASTER.INT_DUR_UNIT_                   DurCalendarUnit,
       MASTER.INT_DUR_LANDINGS_               DurLandings,
       MASTER.INT_DUR_CYCLES_                 DurLandingCycle,
       MASTER.INT_DUR_EQP_CYCLES_             DurEquipmentCycle,
       MASTER.INT_DUR_ROUNDS_                 DurRound,
       ASSIGNMENT.DUE_HOURS_                  DueHours,
       ASSIGNMENT.DUE_DATE_                   DueDate,
       ASSIGNMENT.DUE_LANDINGS_               DueLandings,
       ASSIGNMENT.DUE_CYCLES_                 DueLandingCycle,
       ASSIGNMENT.DUE_EQP_CYCLES_             DueEquipmentCycle,
       ASSIGNMENT.DUE_ROUNDS_                 DueRounds,
       USAGE.CYCLES_                          CurrCycle,
       USAGE.LANDINGS_                        CurrLandings,
       USAGE.TOT_FLIGHT_MINS_                 CurrHours,
       USAGE.ROUNDS_                          CurrRounds,
       (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(FAULT_UNIT.FAULT_NO_, ', ')
        FROM FAULT_UNITS FAULT_UNIT
        WHERE FAULT_UNIT.INSP_ID = ASSIGNMENT.ASSIGNMENT_ID_
          AND FAULT_UNIT.FAULT_STS_ = 'Open') Faults
FROM ASSIGNMENTS ASSIGNMENT
         JOIN ADM_MST_UNITS UNITS ON UNITS.ID_ = ASSIGNMENT.UNIT_ID
         JOIN ADM_MST_TAILS TAILS ON TAILS.UNIT_ID = UNITS.ID_
         JOIN MNT_TRN_INSPECTION_MASTERS MASTER ON MASTER.ID_ = ASSIGNMENT.INSP_MST_ID
         JOIN ADM_MST_SIMPLE_REF INSP_STATUS ON INSP_STATUS.ID_ = ASSIGNMENT.INSP_STAT_ID
         JOIN ADM_TRN_UNIT_USAGE USAGE ON USAGE.UNIT_ID_ = UNITS.ID_

    configDescription: z.string().optional(),

    remarks: z.string().optional(),

        departure: z.string().optional(), 
        arrival: z.string().optional(), 
        etd: z.string().optional(), 
        eta: z.string().optional(), 
        status: z.string().optional(), 
        flightId: z.string().optional(),
        atcStatus : z.string().optional()
    })).optional(),
    crews: z.array(z.object({
        userId: z.string().optional(), 
        rank: z.string().optional(), 
        fullName: z.string().optional(), 
        briefName: z.string().optional(), 
        callSign: z.string().nullable().optional(), 
        seat: z.string().optional(), 
        mobile: z.string().optional(), 
        duty: z.string().optional()
    })).optional()
}).optional()

queries.name: listAllMissions
queries.query:
select m.DATE_                                                                                     [DATE],
       m.MISSION_NO_                                                                               [MISSION_NO],
       mType.DESC_                                                                                 [TYPE],
       mSubType.DESC_                                                                              [SUBTYPE],
       (select ETD_ from FLIGHTS mFlights WHERE mFlights.MISSION_ID_ = m.MISSION_ID_ LIMIT 1)      [ETD],
       (select ETA_ from FLIGHTS mFlights WHERE mFlights.MISSION_ID_ = m.MISSION_ID_ LIMIT 1)      [ETA],
       (select ATD_ from TAIL_FLIGHTS tFlights WHERE tFlights.MISSION_ID_ = m.MISSION_ID_ LIMIT 1) [ATD],
       (select ATA_ from TAIL_FLIGHTS tFlights WHERE tFlights.MISSION_ID_ = m.MISSION_ID_ LIMIT 1) [ATA],

       (select CAST(m.PLTF_CFG_REQ_FUEL_ as INTEGER) || ' ' || ifnull(ref.CODE_, '')
        from ADM_MST_SIMPLE_REF as ref
        where ref.ID_ = m.PLTF_CFG_FUEL_UOM_ID
        LIMIT 1)                                                                                   [OEM_FUEL],

       (select crew.BRF_NAME_
        from MISSION_CREW_PLANS plan
                 JOIN OPS_MST_FLIGHT_CREWS crew on crew.ID_ = plan.FLIGHT_CREW_ID
                 JOIN OPS_MST_DUTY_SYMBOL ds on ds.ID_ = plan.DUTY_SYMBOL_ID
        WHERE plan.MISSION_ID_ = m.MISSION_ID_
          and ds.CODE_ in ('IP', 'PC', 'MP', 'PI', 'SP', 'CP')
        LIMIT 1
       )                                                                                           [PILOT_ONE_PLAN],
       (select crew.BRF_NAME_
        from MISSION_CREW_PLANS plan
                 JOIN OPS_MST_FLIGHT_CREWS crew on crew.ID_ = plan.FLIGHT_CREW_ID
                 JOIN OPS_MST_DUTY_SYMBOL ds on ds.ID_ = plan.DUTY_SYMBOL_ID
        WHERE plan.MISSION_ID_ = m.MISSION_ID_
          and ds.CODE_ in ('IP', 'PC', 'MP', 'PI', 'SP', 'CP')
        LIMIT 1 OFFSET 1
       )                                                                                           [PILOT_TWO_PLAN],
       (select distinct (crew.BRF_NAME_)
        from TAIL_CREW_FLIGHTS crewFlight
                 JOIN OPS_MST_FLIGHT_CREWS crew on crew.ID_ = crewFlight.FLIGHT_CREW_ID
                 JOIN TAIL_CREW_FLIGHT_DETAILS detail
                      on detail.TAIL_CREW_FLIGHT_ID = crewFlight.MISSION_TAIL_CREW_FLIGHT_ID_
                 JOIN OPS_MST_DUTY_SYMBOL ds on ds.ID_ = detail.DUTY_SYMBOL_ID
        WHERE crewFlight.MISSION_ID_ = m.MISSION_ID_
          and ds.CODE_ in ('IP', 'PC', 'MP', 'PI', 'SP', 'CP')
        LIMIT 1
       )                                                                                           [PILOT_ONE_ACTUAL],
       (select distinct (crew.BRF_NAME_)
        from TAIL_CREW_FLIGHTS crewFlight
                 JOIN OPS_MST_FLIGHT_CREWS crew on crew.ID_ = crewFlight.FLIGHT_CREW_ID
                 JOIN TAIL_CREW_FLIGHT_DETAILS detail
                      on detail.TAIL_CREW_FLIGHT_ID = crewFlight.MISSION_TAIL_CREW_FLIGHT_ID_
                 JOIN OPS_MST_DUTY_SYMBOL ds on ds.ID_ = detail.DUTY_SYMBOL_ID
        WHERE crewFlight.MISSION_ID_ = m.MISSION_ID_
          and ds.CODE_ in ('IP', 'PC', 'MP', 'PI', 'SP', 'CP')
        LIMIT 1 OFFSET 1
       )                                                                                           [PILOT_TWO_ACTUAL],
       (select SHORT_NAME_
        from OPS_MST_CALL_SIGNS callSign
        where callSign.ID_ = m.CALL_ID)                                                            [TAIL_CALL_SIGN],
       (select crew.CALL_SIGN_
        from MISSION_CREW_PLANS plan
                 JOIN OPS_MST_FLIGHT_CREWS crew on crew.ID_ = plan.FLIGHT_CREW_ID
        WHERE plan.MISSION_ID_ = m.MISSION_ID_
        LIMIT 1
       )                                                                                           [PILOT_ONE_PLAN_CALL_SIGN],

       (select distinct (crew.CALL_SIGN_)
        from TAIL_CREW_FLIGHTS crewFlight
                 JOIN OPS_MST_FLIGHT_CREWS crew on crew.ID_ = crewFlight.FLIGHT_CREW_ID
        WHERE crewFlight.MISSION_ID_ = m.MISSION_ID_
        LIMIT 1
       )                                                                                           [PILOT_ONE_ACTUAL_CALL_SIGN],
       m.MISS_PLAN_TYPE_                                                                           [CATEGORY],
       (select ACTION_
        from MISSION_HISTORIES history
        WHERE history.MISSION_ID_ = m.MISSION_ID_
        order by history.DATE_TIME_ asc
        LIMIT 1)                                                                                   [STATUS]
from MISSIONS m
         JOIN OPS_MST_MISSION_SUB_TYPES mSubType on mSubType.ID_ = m.MISS_SUB_TYPE_ID
         JOIN OPS_MST_MISSION_TYPES mType on mType.ID_ = mSubType.MISS_TYPE_ID
queries.schemaCode:
z.object({
	DATE:z.string().nullable().optional(),
	MISSION_NO:z.string().nullable().optional(),
	TYPE:z.string().nullable().optional(),
	SUBTYPE:z.string().nullable().optional(),
	ETD:z.string().nullable().optional(),
	ETA:z.string().nullable().optional(),
	ATD:z.any(),
	ATA:z.any(),
	OEM_FUEL:z.any(),
	PILOT_ONE_PLAN:z.string().nullable().optional(),
	PILOT_TWO_PLAN:z.string().nullable().optional(),
	PILOT_ONE_ACTUAL:z.any(),
	PILOT_TWO_ACTUAL:z.any(),
	TAIL_CALL_SIGN:z.string().nullable().optional(),
	PILOT_ONE_PLAN_CALL_SIGN:z.string().nullable().optional(),
	PILOT_ONE_ACTUAL_CALL_SIGN:z.any(),
	CATEGORY:z.string().nullable().optional(),
	STATUS:z.any()
})

queries.name: getTailBattalionAndCommandFromTailNumber
queries.query:
select TAIL.ID_ AS             TAIL_ID_,
       UNIT.SERIAL_NO_         TAIL_NO_,
       UNIT.ID_                TAIL_UNIT_ID_,
       BATTALION.CODE_         BATTALION_CODE_,
       BATTALION.ID_           BATTALION_ID_,
       BATTALION.NAME_         BATTALION_NAME_,
       COMMAND.CODE_           COMMAND_CODE_,
       COMMAND.ID_             COMMAND_ID_,
       COMMAND.NAME_           COMMAND_NAME_,
       PLATFORM_.ID_           PLATFORM_ID_,
       PLATFORM_.CODE_         PLATFORM_CODE_,
       PLATFORM_.EN_LONG_NAME_ PLATFORM_NAME_

from ADM_MST_TAILS AS TAIL
         JOIN ADM_MST_UNITS as UNIT on UNIT.ID_ = TAIL.UNIT_ID
         JOIN ADM_MST_RESTRICTIONS AS BATTALION ON BATTALION.ID_ = TAIL.BATLN_ID
         JOIN ADM_MST_RESTRICTIONS AS COMMAND ON COMMAND.ID_ = BATTALION.PRNT_ID
         JOIN ADM_MST_ITEMS AS ITEM ON ITEM.ID_ = UNIT.ITEM_ID
         JOIN ADM_MST_PLATFORMS AS PLATFORM_ ON PLATFORM_.ID_ = ITEM.ID_
           
WHERE TAIL.T_NUM_ = :tailNumber
queries.schemaCode:
z.object({
	TAIL_ID_:z.number().nullable().optional(),
	TAIL_NO_:z.string().nullable().optional(),
	TAIL_UNIT_ID_:z.number().nullable().optional(),
	BATTALION_CODE_:z.string().nullable().optional(),
	BATTALION_ID_:z.number().nullable().optional(),
	BATTALION_NAME_:z.string().nullable().optional(),
	COMMAND_CODE_:z.string().nullable().optional(),
	COMMAND_ID_:z.number().nullable().optional(),
	COMMAND_NAME_:z.string().nullable().optional(),
	PLATFORM_ID_:z.number().nullable().optional(),
	PLATFORM_CODE_:z.string().nullable().optional(),
	PLATFORM_NAME_:z.string().nullable().optional()
})
